Sentencas: Chromium deposition and poisoning is one of the most fundamental issues affecting the performance stability of La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-delta (LSCF) perovskite electrode materials used in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In this work, the relationship between the surface segregation, Cr deposition and poisoning is studied using atomic force microscopy (AFM), confocal Raman microscopy and electrical conductivity relaxation method.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The results indicate the segregation of SrO and Co3O4 phase on the LSCF surface after heat-treatment at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: After exposed to Cr2O3 at 800 degrees C in dry or wet air for 96 h, Cr deposition on LSCF surface preferentially takes place on the segregated SrO, forming the SrCrO4 phase.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Humidity in air accelerates the surface segregation and formation of SrCrO4 on the LSCF surface.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The present study provides unambiguous evidences that the segregated SrO plays a vital role in the nucleation and grain growth for the Cr deposition process.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Cr deposition significantly deteriorates the surface exchange and diffusion processes for the O-2 reduction reaction on LSCF electrodes.
Titulo: Raman Spectroscopy Study of Chromium Deposition on La0.6Sr0.4Co0.2Fe0.8O3-δ Cathode of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
